title: Carrot Soup
ingredients: ['4 tablespoons margarine', '1 onion, chopped', '2 cloves garlic, finely chopped', '10 carrots, sliced', '1.5 litres chicken stock', '1 pinch dried dill weed', '1 pinch dried marjoram', '1 pinch dried thyme', '1 pinch dried parsley', 'salt to taste', 'ground black pepper to taste', '3 tablespoons cornflour', '125ml whipping cream']
